text: Ani amha lokancya nave ya jagatahi punya lihuna theva ani akhiratamadhyehi. Amhi tujhyacakade laksa kendrita karato. (Allaha) pharmavito ki mi apala prakopa tyacyavaraca avatarita karato, jyavara icchito ani majhya daya-kakseta pratyeka gosta ahe tara ti daya tya lokancya nave avasya lihina, je allahace bhaya balagatata ani jagata (dharmadana) detata ani je amacya ayatinvara imana rakhatata
